academy.title: Resistance vs. Flow
academy.content: Friction creates heat. Flow creates power. If you block the energy, you break. If you channel it, you shine.

nexus.title: Book #6: The Server
nexus.quote: I realized I wasn't a trash can. I was a Server. My job wasn't to keep the data; it was to process it.
